article_title: Why The House Lawsuit Over Cost Sharing Reductions Might Win But Won't Kill Obamacare

article_metadata.description: Some who stimulated the House of Representatives' lawsuit over supposedly illegal payments by the Obama administration for "cost sharing reductions" in the ACA hope that success will kill Obamacare. Those who oppose the lawsuit say that, precisely because those who passed the lawsuit, wouldn't have inserted a self-destruct provision, the House lawsuit should fail. Find out why the suit may have merit but both these proponents and opponents are wrong.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
